programme.title: JAG: Pilot Error
programme.desc: Two Naval aviators die in a crash of an F-14 while using a new fly-by-wire navigation system.(n)

programme.title: JAG: War Cries
programme.desc: In Lima, Peru, while a boy sneaks into the US embassy at night, a Marine guard stops him.(n)

programme.title: JAG: Sightings
programme.desc: In south Texas, residents have reported strange phenomena, stories of supernatural events have abounded, and a 10-year-old girl has disappeared.(n)

programme.title: JAG: Scimitar
programme.desc: Two Marines in a Humvee mistakenly drive into Iraq; an Iraqi detail intercepts them, kills one, and captures the other.(n)

programme.title: JAG: Defensive Action
programme.desc: A patrolling F-14 malfunctions in a no-fly zone; the crew ejects, and the bird explodes.(n)

programme.title: Scorpion: Da Bomb
programme.desc: Team Scorpion is helping with NASA's top secret rocket launch, but they must sabotage their own mission.(n)

programme.title: Scorpion: Fractured
programme.desc: After a powerful earthquake rocks Los Angeles, Team Scorpion must fix a pinched gas line to prevent a massive explosion.(n)

programme.title: Scorpion: Adaptation
programme.desc: While Team Scorpion works to stop an influx of drugs being smuggled into the country via drones, Walter gives Happy and Toby an ultimatum on their new relationship.(n)

programme.title: Scorpion: The Fast & The Nerdiest
programme.desc: After Sylvester scores big on THE PRICE IS RIGHT, Team Scorpion must infiltrate a high-end car smuggling operation about to ship bioweapons to South America.(n)

programme.title: Scorpion: Ticker
programme.desc: When Los Angeles' blood supply is hacked and deemed unusable because of fear it's been tainted, Team Scorpion must find the culprit.(n)

programme.title: Scorpion: Djibouti Call
programme.desc: While on a secret mission in Djibouti, Africa, with his new Homeland protege, Tim Armstrong (Scott Porter), Cabe is captured and Team Scorpion must save him.(n)

programme.title: Rookie Blue: 74 Epiphanies
programme.desc: Andy and Sam’s wedding comes just in time for the gang to celebrate one last hurrah. But when Andy is taken off-course by a hitchhiker and then stranded on the side of a dead-end road with a dying man, she finds herself with no way to get help.(n)

programme.title: Rookie Blue: Blink
programme.desc: In the aftermath of the night’s traumatic events, Andy and Dov try to pull themselves together at an all-night diner, but are caught off-duty and off-guard in a volatile diner hold-up.(n)

programme.title: Rookie Blue: All by Her Selfie
programme.desc: Oliver gets promoted and Andy is tasked with training 15 Division’s newest rookie, Duncan Moore. But when Andy and Duncan respond to a messy homicide at a pawnshop, it’s clear this rookie is going to give Andy the challenge of a lifetime.(n)

programme.title: Rookie Blue: Heart Breakers, Money Makers
programme.desc: When Andy and Nick’s seizure at an illegal gambling house leads to a suspicious confession, Andy recruits Sam to help figure out who’s lying, why, and where the money is, before anyone gets hurt.(n)

programme.title: Rookie Blue: Wanting
programme.desc: When a tenement-building shooting leads to the discovery of an executed gang leader, 15 Division must race to find the killer before a gang war breaks out.(n)

programme.title: Rookie Blue: Going Under
programme.desc: When 15 Division goes undercover at a club-land bar that’s a possible hub for illegal handguns, Chris’s erratic behavior and concern for a specific drug dealer make Dov suspicious.(n)

programme.title: NEW & EXCLUSIVE! Most Haunted
programme.desc: The last part sees the team reach their limits as the spirits of this enormous location continue to emerge from the shadows. But will the enormity of the paranormal activity prove too much for the world-famous team.(n)

programme.title: NEW & EXCLUSIVE! Most Haunted
programme.desc: A haunted house, a haunted school and a haunted auction hall, all in one location, Bishton Hall. With stories of poltergeist activity, ghostly figures, strange voices and a dark entity, what will the Most Haunted team uncover tonight.(n)

programme.title: NEW & EXCLUSIVE! Most Haunted
programme.desc: With the night getting ever more active and poltergeist activity growing, something seems to target one of the team. And what activity could make Glen state ‘’that is paranormal’’.(n)

programme.title: NEW & EXCLUSIVE! Most Haunted
programme.desc: Tired from this long investigation, the team continue where one of them realises that the idea to investigate along was a mistake, but can the others get there in time. And something has a final message for the team as they leave.(n)

programme.title: Ghost Hunters: Century of Haunting
programme.desc: On this episode of Ghost Hunters, TAPS travels to Oxford, Massachusetts to help a family in need. The house has been in the Voas family for two generations, and lots of activity has been reported, from apparitions to shadow figures.(n)

programme.title: Ghost Hunters: Soul Searching
programme.desc: For the first time ever, TAPS revisits Belcourt Castle in Newport, Rhode Island to investigate claims surrounding a deceased friend.(n)

programme.title: Ghost Hunters: Essex County Penitentiary
programme.desc: The TAPS team is joined by Destination Truthhost Josh Gates as the team returns to Essex County, New Jersey to investigate a notorious penitentiary with a horrifying past.(n)

programme.title: Ghost Hunters: Garden State Asylum
programme.desc: The TAPS team travels to New Jersey to investigate the infamous Essex County Hospital.(n)

programme.title: Ghost Hunters: Manor of Mystery
programme.desc: A Museum Director and a volunteer are fearful that an upcoming Victorian exhibit about the Victorian Era and Spiritualism will uncover and agitate entities from that time period.(n)

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.185
programme.desc: A woman’s life-long dream to have plastic surgery is fulfilled by her ex-fiancé who demands that he be paid back; a Christmas day fight over child custody further escalates their fight.(n)

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.23
programme.desc: A man is accused of assaulting his daughter and fracturing her back; she sues him for the cost of medical bills/A Harley Davidson is repossessed and a friendship ends when women fight over late payments on the vehicle.(n)

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.15
programme.desc: Ex live-in lovers fight over a truck repossession, a large co-signed loan, and insurance/After an arrest for stealing a lawnmower, a man is allegedly bailed out by his girlfriend who claims she helped pay for his gall bladder surgery.(n)

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.212
programme.desc: Ex-friends fight over charges on an allegedly stolen credit card.\t\t\t\r\nA man admits that he smashed his ex-girlfriend’s cell phone after reading her texts to another man and claims she is responsible for his belongings being stolen.(n)

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.222
programme.desc: A man sues his child's mother for an unpaid cable bill and missing belongings, admitting he owes her back child support. A father and his adult son fight over $60,000 in back child support and $5,000 in allegedly misappropriated emergency money.(n)

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.130
programme.desc: Man, after serving four years for robbery, accused of assaulting ex-girlfriend; his new girlfriend admits to breaking ex's car window/A teenager sues tow truck driver and car dealer for return of money paid for used Dodge Stratus.(n)

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.56
programme.desc: 14-year-old accused of damaging neighbor's screen door; claims inability to reach damaged spot. Ex-lovers dispute cost to terminate Las Vegas timeshare; one alleges never using the property.(n)

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.71
programme.desc: Woman accuses ex-husband of assaulting her with binoculars after accusing him of cheating on Mother’s Day. Boy accused of hitting child with rock; child’s mother sues ex-live-in boyfriend for cost of fixing daughter’s broken teeth.(n)

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.198
programme.desc: A teenager, awarded a scholarship, admits to stealing a phone and erasing contacts. Another teen is accused of urinating in ex-friend's gas tanks as a joke.(n)

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.208
programme.desc: Ex-lovers dispute ownership of a snow blower, weight bench, and alleged loan. License plate found in damaged car from a crash, but alleged party denies responsibility.(n)

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.154
programme.desc: A man says he was thrown on top of a car by a club bouncer after being wrongfully accused of hitting someone in the bathroom.\t\t\t\r\nA woman sues her twin brother for allegedly drinking, driving her car without permission, and wrecking it.(n)

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen USA
programme.desc: The teams must prepare dishes in a relay race; the winning team gets a day of fun in the sun; the losing team must clean the entire restaurant; one chef is eliminated.(n)

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen USA
programme.desc: Two teams are combined into one, and each chef is given one main ingredient and asked to create a dish suitable to chef Ramsay's palate; during the dinner service, the chefs have difficulty getting food out to the patrons.(n)

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen USA
programme.desc: The chefs are challenged to teach cooking-impaired housewives how to make a gourmet meal; chefs Mark Peel and Ben Ford treat the challenge winner to a one-on-one course; the chefs struggle to balance a dozen appetisers, entrées and desserts.(n)

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen USA
programme.desc: The final four chefs prepare a special luncheon for 80 pregnant women, who choose their favourite dish and send the winner on a $1,000 shopping spree; during the dinner service, one chef gets careless and burns chef Ramsay's hand.(n)

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen USA
programme.desc: Chef Ramsay invites the final three chefs and a few special guests to a breakfast he prepared, and asks the chefs to recreate a signature dish; the chefs each take a turn running the hot plate during the dinner service.(n)

programme.desc: The final two chefs are rewarded with a trip to New York, where they are asked to prepare their signature dishes; the chefs must prove their skill and passion by designing and running their own restaurants; Whoopi Goldberg makes an appearance.(n)

programme.title: Undercover Boss Canada
programme.desc: This episode nets an exclusive “behind the scenes” look at what it really takes to get fish on our dinner plates.(n)

programme.title: Undercover Boss USA
programme.desc: Dan Dizio is the CEO of the fastest growing pretzel bakery on the East Coast, Philly Pretzel Factory. Dan goes undercover as Michael Downs, a data entry processor who will be switching jobs with Philly Pretzel employees.(n)

programme.title: Undercover Boss Canada
programme.desc: Purdy’s dominates the West Coast, but is struggling to make an impression elsewhere. To boost sales, the Chocolate Queen travels the country, working in disguise in her own stores and factory floors.(n)

programme.title: Undercover Boss Canada
programme.desc: PJ’s Pets is one of the nation’s oldest pet store chains, but the company has a new President in place, and she’s determined to rattle a few cages. Margaret Kordas steps out of her stilettos when she spends a week working in her own stores.(n)

programme.title: Undercover Boss Canada
programme.desc: For nearly 20 years, T&T Supermarket dominated sales, but now competition is “cut throat”. That's good enough reason for Tina Lee, the boss of T&T Supermarket, to swap her upscale lifestyle for a week working undercover in her own stores.(n)

programme.desc: Lynne Zappone, the Chief Talent Officer of Popeye’s Louisiana Kitchen, a restaurant chain that generates more than $2 billion in annual revenue, goes undercover posing as a participant in a reality show called Job Swap.(n)

programme.title: Operation Repo starts 9pm
programme.desc: STARTS 9PM Take a ride along with Operation Repo! This docudrama series takes an in-depth look at the professional, but sometimes murky world of car repossession. Get ready for the drama!(n)

programme.title: Operation Repo: Get That Prowler
programme.desc: First, Lou, Sonia, and Froy unfurl an elaborate sting when they repo a taxicab by tricking its driver into picking them up. But what to do with his ferociously inebriated client? Then, Matt and Froy attempt to repo a DeLorean.(n)

programme.title: Operation Repo: Up Up and Away
programme.desc: First, it's up, up, and away, for Lou, Froy, and Matt. All of their skills are tested when they attempt to take down not one, but two hot air balloons. Then, Lou and Froy find themselves in the wrong part of town, repo'ing a sports car.(n)

programme.title: Operation Repo: Family Drama
programme.desc: First, Lou, Froy, and Matt team up with Eva, an alluring lending agent, who sets up a sting to repo a limousine from its delinquent owner.(n)

programme.title: Operation Repo: Kegger and Refrigerator
programme.desc: First, Lyndah has some tension with Frankie when they repo a truck from a moving company in the middle of relocating some fragile material for a very important client. Then, Froy, Sonia, and Frankie crash a raging kegger in a bad part of town.(n)

programme.title: Operation Repo: Going Green and Falling Down
programme.desc: First, Sonia and Froy arrive on the scene to a repo a car that's been refitted to run on biodiesel and are shocked to see that its owner shares some of Sonia's features.(n)

programme.title: Operation Repo: Look What You Did!
programme.desc: First, Sonia and Froy get locked in the battle of a lifetime with a pair of young debtors who are understandably upset that their late-model Tahoe has found its way to the bottom of a lake. Is it Froy's fault, as they claim, or are there other forces at..(n)

programme.title: Operation Repo: That's Disrespectful
programme.desc: First, Sonia and Lyndah are faced with a choice. Do they attempt to reclaim a burnt-out husk of a car from its high-flying owners, or do they just give up and go home?(n)

programme.title: Operation Repo: Smoke, Lead, and Alcohol
programme.desc: First, Matt and Froy venture into one of the city's most dangerous neighborhoods, only to find a debtor ready to defend his ride by pumping it full of lead, with no concern for who gets caught in the crossfire.(n)

programme.title: Operation Repo: Missed Dates
programme.desc: First, Lyndah is put in a tough situation - she has to control a sobbing, cop-calling debtor and turn away Frankie's unwanted and inappropriate advances - all at the same time. Then, Matt and Froy have two problems on their hands.(n)

programme.title: Operation Repo: Broken Tooth Lou and Bad Breath Frankie
programme.sub-title: Broken Tooth Lou and Bad Breath Frankie
programme.desc: First, Froy and Lyndah probably need to schedule a trip to the dentist after Lou's tooth gets knocked out in the course of a tense confrontation with two irate debtors. Then, Frankie seriously blows a routine voluntary repo when the owner smells something.(n)

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: Double Down
programme.desc: Jeff and Audrey panic when they are told they might be having twins. Meanwhile, Russell throws a citizenship party for Timmy to impress a girl.(n)

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: Cheating
programme.desc: Audrey tries to persuade Jeff to eat healthier when he is diagnosed with high cholesterol, but he can’t help sneaking around with Brenda for unhealthy food.(n)

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: Scavenger Hunt
programme.desc: To try to show his care and interest in their relationship, Jeff sends Audrey on a scavenger hunt, as suggested by Adam. Russell thinks Jennifer has a sex tape and enlists Timmy’s help in finding it.(n)

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: The Last of the Red Hat Lovers
programme.sub-title: The Last of the Red Hat Lovers
programme.desc: Russell books a cruise that he thinks is filled with 'red hot' ladies but instead, it's filled with ladies from the Red Hat society. Meanwhile, Timmy tries to help Jeff and Audrey settle an argument.(n)

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: Dirty Talk
programme.desc: Russell tries to get out of his marriage to an overly enthused Liz, who tries to make it work, while Jeff attempts to engage Audrey in dirty talk.(n)

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: Bros Before Nodes
programme.desc: Worried about getting his father's approval, Russell gets Liz all dolled up to meet him.(n)

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: Audrey Is Dumb
programme.desc: Jeff celebrates Audrey's inability to talk after her node removal surgery. Russell gets Timmy to fire an employee for him, and Adam discovers he's only getting free stuff because of his good looks.(n)

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: Nature Calls
programme.desc: Everyone spends a weekend in Vermont to watch the leaves change. During the trip, Adam gets poison ivy on his hands, Jeff has an embarrassing experience on the inn's computer, and Liz begins to realize that her marriage is a sham.(n)

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: Shy Dial
programme.desc: Jeff uses an app on his phone that automatically puts his calls through to Audrey's voicemail. Meanwhile, Adam befriends a clothing salesman who helps him against his friends when he picks up some questionable clothing choices.(n)

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Make a Wish
programme.desc: Dog shows his love of justice and children in this poignant episode. He begins by giving encouragement to a group of handicapped children, then starting the search for Jacob, a fugitive who's abandoned his wife and children.(n)

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Tough Love
programme.desc: Michael is out on bail for drug sales, theft, and violation of parole. Dog's after him for failing to appear in court and his only lead is Jen, his co-signer and girlfriend.(n)

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Surprise Ending
programme.desc: Dog and the boys are going after a fugitive with a $25,000 bond and a string of theft charges behind him. When the team hits his apartment, they find a boot print on the door, a souvenir of a police raid from only days earlier?(n)

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: The Big Wipe-Out
programme.desc: A Hawaiian surfing hero is on a wave to nowhere and it's Dog's turn to play lifeguard. "Buttons," known throughout the islands for his prowess on the waves and his daring 360's, has wiped-out on the rocky shoals of drug addiction.(n)

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: You Can Bet On It!
programme.desc: Kristine had a string of gambling and forgery charges before she jumped bail leaving Dog "holding the bag". Now it's time for Dog to call in some chits of his own, getting the help of trusty informants he's helped out over the years.(n)

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Fly Boy
programme.desc: Dog told him not to go, but Charles went anyway, skipping to Oregon against the terms of his bail. Now Dog has a tip that Charles plans to slip back into Honolulu. With $30,000 on the line Dog knows he can leave little to chance.(n)

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Guns & Ice
programme.desc: The following day is Dog's birthday but that won't stop him from chasing a fugitive, who is facing firearms charges. Dog doesn't relish the thought of going after an alleged gunslinger on his birthday but he's never one to avoid a challenge.(n)

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: The Good Fight
programme.desc: Dog and Beth have to be at the state capitol bright and early to receive an award for their fight against ice in Hawaii. Afterwards, they're inspired to start the hunt for Shanna, an alleged ice user and identity thief with $80,000 in bonds.(n)

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: The Smackdown of Baby Lyssa
programme.desc: After meeting with the cosigner on a bond for a man named John, Dog and the Posse hatch a plan to lure him to a high rise apartment. But when night falls, their plan leaves a member of the team alone and in harm's way!(n)

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: A Friend in Need
programme.desc: Roger has 27 prior arrests, spent years in jail and doesn't want to go back. But he's missed court and now Dog has to bring him in. To complicate matters, this fugitive lives in a tightly-knit community where good information won't come easy.(n)

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Your Lying Eyes
programme.desc: Kolani's on the run, left his wife to look after four kids and left Dog holding the bag for the $10k bond. So their pursuit on this case takes them into some parts of Ohau, and the human heart, that few of us will ever see.(n)

programme.desc: The following day is Dog's birthday but that won't stop him from chasing a fugitive, who is facing firearms charges. Dog doesn't relish the thought of going after an alleged gunslinger on his birthday but he's never one to avoid a challenge.(n)

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: The Good Fight
programme.desc: Dog and Beth have to be at the state capitol bright and early to receive an award for their fight against ice in Hawaii. Afterwards, they're inspired to start the hunt for Shanna, an alleged ice user and identity thief with $80,000 in bonds.(n)

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: The Smackdown of Baby Lyssa
programme.desc: After meeting with the cosigner on a bond for a man named John, Dog and the Posse hatch a plan to lure him to a high rise apartment. But when night falls, their plan leaves a member of the team alone and in harm's way!(n)

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: A Friend in Need
programme.desc: Roger has 27 prior arrests, spent years in jail and doesn't want to go back. But he's missed court and now Dog has to bring him in. To complicate matters, this fugitive lives in a tightly-knit community where good information won't come easy.(n)

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Your Lying Eyes
programme.desc: Kolani's on the run, left his wife to look after four kids and left Dog holding the bag for the $10k bond. So their pursuit on this case takes them into some parts of Ohau, and the human heart, that few of us will ever see.(n)

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Make a Wish
programme.desc: Dog shows his love of justice and children in this poignant episode. He begins by giving encouragement to a group of handicapped children, then starting the search for Jacob, a fugitive who's abandoned his wife and children.(n)

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Tough Love
programme.desc: Michael is out on bail for drug sales, theft, and violation of parole. Dog's after him for failing to appear in court and his only lead is Jen, his co-signer and girlfriend.(n)

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Surprise Ending
programme.desc: Dog and the boys are going after a fugitive with a $25,000 bond and a string of theft charges behind him. When the team hits his apartment, they find a boot print on the door, a souvenir of a police raid from only days earlier?(n)

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: The Big Wipe-Out
programme.desc: A Hawaiian surfing hero is on a wave to nowhere and it's Dog's turn to play lifeguard. "Buttons," known throughout the islands for his prowess on the waves and his daring 360's, has wiped-out on the rocky shoals of drug addiction.(n)

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: You Can Bet On It!
programme.desc: Kristine had a string of gambling and forgery charges before she jumped bail leaving Dog "holding the bag". Now it's time for Dog to call in some chits of his own, getting the help of trusty informants he's helped out over the years.(n)

programme.title: Sanctuary: Sanctuary For All Pt 2
programme.desc: The enigmatic Dr. Helen Magnus recruits an insightful forensic psychiatrist Will Zimmerman (ROBIN DUNNE) to join her in the quest to track, study and protect the strange, and often terrifying creatures that secretly populate our world. Part 2.(n)

programme.title: Sanctuary: Fata Morgana
programme.desc: Dr. Helen Magnus, her daughter Ashley, and new to the Sanctuary, Dr. Will Zimmerman release three women from a mysterious crypt in Scotland, bringing them back to the Sanctuary for refuge.(n)

programme.title: Sanctuary: Folding Man
programme.desc: An investigation into a string of bizarre robberies leads Magnus and Will to a crime ring of thieves who seem to be able to slip between the cracks of the law…literally.(n)

programme.title: Sanctuary: Kush
programme.desc: Returning with an abnormal captured in the Himalayas, Magnus and Will are stranded from civilization and aid after their plane goes down in a desolate mountain range.(n)

programme.title: Sanctuary: Nubbins
programme.desc: When a mating pair of cute, furry and seemingly harmless abnormals is brought in for scientific study, the Sanctuary team begins to exhibit some hidden animal attractions for one another.(n)

programme.title: Auction Hunters: Gangster Whiskey
programme.desc: Allen and Ton trek to an auction in Moreno Valley, CA, where two locker wins yield a vintage jukebox, a valuable baseball card and a Prohibition-era moonshine still.(n)

programme.title: Auction Hunters: Sink or Swim
programme.desc: 1905 Hand-crank Thomas Edison gramophone with cylindrical records; a discontinued Addictor 190 Mini Boat; a rare 1897 Regina music box.(n)

programme.title: Auction Hunters: Disco and Dice
programme.desc: 1978 Williams Disco pinball machine; 1898 dice popper gambling device; talking 1990s bar top breathalyzer; deadly fishing harpoon.(n)

programme.title: Auction Hunters: The Real Thing
programme.desc: Allen and Ton compete with a notorious deep-pocketed bidder in Oxnard, CA, and score a vintage Coca-Cola vending machine, a vintage desk and a rare 1971 GMC truck.(n)

programme.title: Auction Hunters: Fake Punt Payoff
programme.desc: Ton and Allen contend with a large crowd of inexperienced auction-buyers at a huge storage container auction in Pasadena. They find a small fleet of Segway personal transporters and an enormous custom-made shotgun.(n)

programme.title: Auction Hunters: Hula Moola
programme.desc: Ton and Allen jet to the Hawaiian islands where they're joined by a feisty new female assistant! The team uncovers a pair of James Bond-style gadgets designed for high-speed underwater travel and a vintage sled.(n)

programme.title: Auction Hunters: The Jersey Score
programme.desc: Ton & Allen attend a silent auction in NJ, but that doesn't stop the local buyers from letting them know they're not welcome! They uncover a skeet throwing machine from the 1960's & a vintage vehicle with some real horsepower!(n)

programme.title: Auction Hunters: Hot Wheels
programme.desc: '70s sand rail dune racer with rally hemi heads; 1965 replica Mustang pool table; off-road racing gear.(n)

programme.title: Auction Hunters: Friends in Hawaii Places
programme.desc: Allen &Ton enlist an assistant, Carolyn, and Allen's Hawaiian buddy, Junior, to help them battle local buyers. The guys find a WWII-era motor scooter and a stash of antique Polynesian tattoo tools that get used on Ton!(n)

programme.title: Auction Hunters: Voodoo Moola
programme.desc: Allen & Ton hit a storage auction in Louisiana's Capitol City and quickly find themselves in trouble with the law! The guys uncover a pair of racing lawnmowers and then stumble on an antique barber chair from the early 1900s!(n)
